name: Night Shift ALPAH
description:
Welcome to Night Shift of Terror, a first-person horror game where you play as a security guard working the night shift at a deserted office building. Your job is to keep a watchful eye on the building and ensure that everything is secure.

As you settle into your shift, strange things start to happen. You hear strange noises, doors opening and closing on their own, and see unexplainable shadows moving across the walls. The more you investigate, the more you realize that something is not right in this building.

As you continue on your shift, you soon realize that you are not alone. An evil presence is stalking you, and you must find a way to survive the night and make it out alive.

Built using the HorrorEngine in Unreal Engine 5.

Controls:

W A S D ---> Movement

Right Click  --> Pick up/Use 

Left Click --->  Interact 

Space ---> Jump

Ctrl ---> Crouch
